title: I just played against my first "decent" Mordekaiser bot...

replies.body:
It's really not.

The problem with Morde, just like any fighter/juggernaut is that they are extremely vulnerable to being kited.
Morde has no CC, he's got no gap closer.
He can only walk up to you and hope to hit you a few times. This is difficult most times, but when you add in that bot lane typically has plenty of CC on the support, and the ADC usually has some way to kite about for days, it really makes Mordekaiser have a bad time.

Yeah Morde hits like a truck, but he probably can't reach you. He's hardly broken.

Sure but in Solo Queue where you don't always get the privilege of counterpicking, it's a problem. Also, tie him in with a support with lots of cc or "pulls" Like Thresh, Blitz or Naut and his relevance boosts up immensely. If you could pick against a Morde really early on, I think you'd be fine, but you don't always get the luxury in Solo Q.
The main three ADCs in YoloQ right now are very much Anti-Brawler. Vayne/Sivir/Jinx. They each have some sort of kite or CC.

I'm in Silver/Bronze Elo.

People do not kite. I'd try but I can't ADC for shite anyway

ADCs aren't the only ones who can kite.
I only mentioned ADCs because Morde is currently being played where he'll be against them.
